content.rendered:
We are here with yet another update that was requested the most. The updates are the following below:

What’s New:

  • Updated User interface (UI) to help understand the data better
  • We have separated the dApp dashboard and token dashboard to get a better understanding of the data.
  • We have added new alerts like whales connecting to the dApp, total value extraction, and much more.
  • Now a dApp creator can integrate multiple dApps in their user ID to easily access all their dApps from one screen.
  • Wallet profiling UI updated to get a better understanding of the user.
  • User Journey section updated to know where your user dropped from your dApp.
  • Support for multi-chain tokens added for dApps having more than one token.

Spock needs your feedback to improve more. Visit spockanalytics.xyz and use our free interactable demo and provide us with your feedback at hello@spockanalytics.xyz.
